vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Τιμαῖος, -ου, ὁ (Aram. טִימַי (?), see Zorell, see word),
Timæus: Mrk.10:46.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Mrk.10.46;
father of: Bartimaeus (G0924)
§ Timaeus, "precious, valuable"
Timaeus, (Proper name), Mk. 10:46*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
底買 这个陽性專有名詞在亞蘭文的意思是 "極被珍視的"
一個瞎子（巴底買）的父親 #可 10:46|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
底买 这个阳性专有名词在亚兰文的意思是 "极被珍视的"
一个瞎子（巴底买）的父亲 #可 10:46|
